DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy single-port three-port adnexal surgery patient benign ovarian tubal disease
DOC.brief_title: Study Laparoendoscopic Single Site Adnexal Surgery Benign Ovarian Tubal Disease
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo laparoscopic adnexal surgery due follow benign adenxal disease 1 . Benign teratoma 2 . Endometrioma 3 . Mucinous cystadenoma 4 . Serous cystadenoma 5 . Benign Brenner tumor 6 . Ectopic pregnancy ( cornual , tubal , ovarian pregnancy , etc . ) 7. paratubal cyst , parovarian cyst 8 . Risk reduce bilateral salpingooophorecotmy due familial breast/ovarian cancer syndrome 9 . Other benign adnexal disease require surgery American Society Anesthesiologist Physical Status classification III . Patient sign write informed consent Uncontrolled medical disease Active infectious disease Previous pelvic radiation therapy Patient require procedure exclude adnexal surgery Patient pain source exclude adnexal disease Pregnant lactating woman
